content: Hi, is there any library or built-in data structures I can use for tree automata? I want to prove the correctness of an algorithm that involves tree automata. I'm thinking of starting with structure, a simple record type created for tree automata, but if there's anything that already exists in Lean, I would like to make use of that. :smile:
Ah, I see. I guess I'll just have to create one for myself!
Yunjeong Lee has marked this topic as resolved.
